title: Fun Making Sweets
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Kotori-chan, is this about the right amount?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Let’s see.... Yeah, that’s good! It’s my first time making a no-bake cheesecake with grapefruits, so I was kind of worried, but I’m glad I got the recipe from Kanata-san~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah! Even we could make this ourselves, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, let’s do our best~. If it turns out great, then maybe I’ll bring it to Honoka-chan and the others<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I kind of want to make a mikan version of this for Chika-chan and the others....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I see, they love mikan, huh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That’s right! We’re using grapefruits for today’s, but mikan also comes from the same citrus-type, so I think I can make it work....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s mikan season too, so it’ll definitely be tasty. Alright, we have to properly remember how to make it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah, I’ll do my best! Let’s make it delicious, Kotori-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Let’s combine our strengths~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
